responses.answer: The alpha_wave is most commonly seen in the parietal or occipital region and is suppressed by visual and sensory stimuli.
Sensitivity drift is NOT a nonlinear characteristic of a biometric measuring device.
Fibrillation is the phenomenon where the myocardium contracts and relaxes asynchronously due to the electrical and structural chaos in the heart.
The incorrect description is that piezoelectric devices generate electromotive force due to temperature difference; they do not generate electromotive force from temperature difference.
electrocardiograph does not use piezoelectric sensor
